decision_conditions: This permission shall be for a limited period expiring on 31/03/2005 when the use shall be discontinued.  REASON: Permission has only been granted due to the special community based service which the applicant provides; and would not otherwise be appropriate because of the loss of two core retail units. | The use granted shall be personal to Action Acton only and shall not enure for the benefit of the land, or any other person or company without the prior written permission of the Local Planning Authority.  If after the development has been carried out Action Acton .ceases to be the occupier of the land the use shall be discontinued.  REASON: Permission has only been granted due to the special community based service which the applicant provides; and would not otherwise be appropriate because of the loss of two core retail units.
description: Use of two shops as offices for Action Acton regeneration agency base
